articles.description: The Eternal star was married for 19 years to former Liverpool player Jamie
articles.content:
Louise Redknapp gave husband Jamie a brutal but honest explanation as to why she was ending their marriage.
 The Eternal star was married for 19 years to former Liverpool player Jamie, giving up her… [+2841 chars]
